Leon opened fire and was back-steping. The bullets that hit, didn't slow Sen-Lee.
Sen-Lee speared Leon into the wall, then started sabeing him in the cheast.

Leon aimed right for his eye and shot it with his gun in his left hand.

Leon smriked then kick the inside of the line, and the fell inwards.

Looking over Leon said "Thank God" running to the person in the corner.
But then he heard Sen-Lee's voice "You fool". Truning around and takeing Sen-Lee down to the ground.

“Leo run!!” Leon yelled. Leo ran out of the room and saw the door out.
He looked back but then ran out to the hall. He finally busted out to the outside.
“Man what the fuck is going on” Leo said panting. Then a fire ball busted out the top of the building.
Leon came down and landed hard and the ground. He got up and said “let’s go”

Leon and Leo ran to the old D.C hid-out.
“Fuck I haven’t been here in a long time” Leon said opening the door.
They walked in and every thing is covered with dust.
Leon pulled out one of his guns and reloaded it. He then handed it to Leo “Here”
“What are you going to do dad?” Leo said. “I will bring Nikki here” Leon said.

Leon opened the door that lead to the basement.
He went in and open a door, and pulled out a box.
“I am sorry John” Leon said with his eyes closed.
“The vision of him slowly loading the clip into his gun, and then shooting.
And the vision of slowly aiming at John and fireing the last round.”Leon shook his head and put the box back up.
He jumped into a portal to Nikki

"20 years has pasted, and sortly after Leon and Nikk broke off.

11.title: Trubble has Risen, Time for a Plan

111.content:
The elven city....

Hikari glanced across her balcony room.
It was still as beautiful as she remembered...
Kronous came behind her.

"You look tense...are you ok?"
She leaned against him.
" I don't know....
We somehow managed to patch things up with my peoples council...
Returning whatever scrolls i didn't use..helped i suppose."

A noise inside the room caused both to turn.
Their daughter had entered their room.

"Mom?
The council sent me here to find you...
They want our family in chambers...."
Kronous and Hikari looked at each other....

"Chambers?
We haven't done anything..."
Kronous held her hands in his.
"Whatever this is about...we'll deal with it...together..."

Hikari looked at their daughter.
She looked very similar to her.

Tall...athletic...beautiful smile.
Her silver hair shone when the moon was out.
Her green eyes calmed even the most raged beast.

"Ok Serena...go on ahead and tell them we are on our way."
Her daughter nodded and left.
111.title: sensing trouble

1111.content:
Hikari, Kronous, and Serena entered the massive chambers and knelt before the elder council.
"We have called you here in secret...
There is a danger that threatens our very way of life."

Hikari looked up at the council.
"What would you have us do?"
The oldest member glanced down at the family.

"You must head out and face this new menace...
Track down your old friends...find this evil..and destroy it."
Hikari and Kronous stand.
"Your father..rest his soul...would want this.
You are the only one we can count on to help us."

Hikari nodded.
" I will follow the councils wishes.
C'mon Serena..."
The family stands and exits the chambers.

Kronous glances at Hikari.
Fiery determination is sketched all over her face.
"Where do we start?"
Hikari turns to her family.

"We have a few choices...
We can try and find Leon and his family.
We can track down the Templars or the Werewolves."

A voice interrupts her.
"Don't think you'll leave me here."
Everyone turns to see Kaneda facing them.
"Kaneda..."
She approaches Hikari.

" I swore all those years ago...to stand with you.
I plan to do that...no matter where you go."
Hikari hugged Kaneda.
She lightly pushed the elf girl away.

"What's our strategy?
Where we heading first?"
1111.title: at council chambers

choices: At D.C., everyone meets up there
11112.content:
Kronous mused, deciding to find Sev and Faopaw first. The last time he saw Sev was a year ago, and the young templar that he knew had...aged very much, either due to stress or just his position. Then there was Faopaw, and Kronous had not seen the furry leader over a decade. He would indeed wish to find Leon and Nikki, but something told him to find the others first. He thought this was due to the fact that they could feel, or detect any kind of evil. Kronous wished the old man was alive to see this, but he shook his head. Andersdon would've been proud, and most likely would've joined in.
"I believe," Kronous said," we should find Sev and Faopaw first. If there was anything wrong, they of all people would know."
"I agree." Kaneda said, " Sev has a knack for finding evil, and Faopaw is able to sniff out unnaturaul things...literally."
"And maybe," Kronous thought aloud, a familair glint in his eyes," we'll be able to aquire the help of my friends."
"Maybe Darion will help." Hikari agreed, but she added," but I'm pretty sure the other two would weigh us down."
"Well," Kronous shrugged," we just need one, and Darion will do just fine. He has really improved with his blade, and even I am a little iffy to fight him."
Hikari shrugged, indicating she was satsified with the results, and Kaneda nodded, approvingly. Kronous turned to his daughter, the glint in his eyes was still there.
"What of you, lil' shadow?" Kronous asked Serena with a chuckle," will you care to join?"
"I don't really have a choice if Aunt Kaneda isn't going to be here to watch me," Serena said with a smile,"it would be nice to see the world beyond the city."
Kronous grinned. He could already tell that this would be quite intresting.

------

Sev stood with one of the captains he knew so well, discussing a strange occurence that had happened in a desert, and Sev couldn't put his finger on it, but he had felt this strange energy before.
"This could either be good," Jorm said, talking to Sev," or bad. You say you felt this energy before. Was a good aura? Or bad?"
"I... Can't remember. I recall experiencing it years ago, but I can't pin point when." Sev said, putting his fingers to his temples," but I know it was an acient power."
"Progress!" Jorm exclaimned," well, we know it's ancient now. But--"
Jorm was cut off by a horse galloping up to Sev, a courier on the back who looked beyond exhaustion due to riding great lengths.
"Speak, courier," Sev said before the messenger said anything.
"Vice-captain....of the sixth....has asked of you to meet with him," the courier said, taking deep breaths," at... D.c."
"So the slayer of evil wants to meet again," Sev said, finding himself smiling," very well. I'll be there in a day or two. But rest, courier."

------

Faopaw was sniffing around, his nose picking up a familar scent. It smelt of fear, evil, and hate. Growling Faopaw stood up, looking around. What could discharge those kind of sensations? Faopaw had felt and smelled it before, but couldn't really remember how or where.
"Corh, Fel!" Faopaw said in a gruff voice, turning to the two guards who were with him," let us head back. Something is not right with the wilds."
The two werwwolves merely nodded, dropped to all fours, and ran off quickly, Faowpaw following close behind. Still wondering what made the smell, Faopaw would have to send a long runner to Avelwind, a druid who has long protected the wilds. However, when they returned, there was a long runner waiting for him.
"Speak, brother," Faopaw said in a commanding gruff voice."
"The one-shape slayer has requested for you to meet with him in D.C." The long runner said, standing up.
"Aha! A perfect chance to seize this oppotunity to warn others! Long runner, go to Druid Avelwind and tell him to meet me in D.C." Faopaw said, rubbing his paws together," it will be nice to see the slayer again."
11112.title: Find the Light and the Wild

"He shall be with us before the day ends."
With that, the werewolves ran off to find leon and his family.

Faopaw snorted, which told Kronous what Faopaw thought about that, yeah right. Kronous gave a shrug and turned to speak with Sev. Faopaw barked orders to his escort, who seemed to just nod their heads.
"Bad things are going to start happening," Sev said,"and when they do, we bettered be prepared."
Kronous nodded in agreement. The rest of the night was spent on catching each others lives', challenging to duels, and dinner. Afetr all that, they went to bed to catch some sleep.

"And why do you say that?" Avelwind asked. "If I am right K-4 is a dieing faction, why would another help them? All of the factions that are agesnt us wouldn't help K-4" Leo said. "Good point, but we never know for sure" Hikari said. Leon growled and said "That is the thing, K-4 is a dieing faction ever since the battle at the grasslands, why would a new faction take intrest in them since they failed befor". Kronous eys widen "The new faction may be trieing to trick K-4". Leon smirked "I will go and see what K-4 has to do with this, Leo you are going with me". Leo nodded and walked off, going to get ready. "And what about us?" Kronous asked. "I say you and Hikari trie to find out more about the shadow creaters, they must be in a book somewhere, wouldn't be suprised if the book is 5,000 years old or something" Leon said standing all the way up. "I say we wait till they come or I find what is realy happening" Sen-Gie nooed and said "Allso we don't know much about this new evil and that is not good, better wait till we know someting" The gruop nodded. Leon sighed and said as he walked off "Never tought that I would be doing this shit agean"
------
Leo and Leon stood at the tree line, the view of a K-4 outpost. "Leo you go in the outpost, there H.Q is not far from here, get any infomation you can". Leon nodded but said "How will I get in?". "Do what I do, use the front door" Leon said handing Leo his revloers. "I haven't been doing this as long as you have" Leo looking back at the outpost. "Leo, I need you for this, while you are takeing care of the outpost, I will trie to suck the new leaders blood". Leo sighed and ran off. Leon pulled out Soul Edge and said to himeslef "I want to get ride of this fuckn' blade, I don't know how much longer I can hide Soul Edge from the group".
111121111111111111.title: We need more information!

1111211111111111111.content:
"Wait." Avelwind said to the four still present, "There is something you should know. Something about who created these....shadowy beings."
"I'm all ears, Venerable One." Darion said, turing back to the druid, "And I believe that the slayer and templar will hear you out as well."
"The one who created them is known as Daltar, the Lord of the Nether Dragons." Avelwind grimaced, his eyes lost in a past memory, "he and his dragons served Cthlulhu without question, and the poor king had lost himself to the madness of his new master. But since the defeat of his lord, he must be working with the other two in order to revive the false god."
"Other two?" Darion asked, "there were two others who had also served that....thing?"
"Aye." The druid nodded, "The other two are known as Alec the Reanimator, and the other, Koas the champion of Chaos. They had all pledged allengience to the dark god and are now trying to find a way to bring him back."
"This can't be good." Kronous said, "I don't want to fight him again 20 years later."

---------

The shadows had gone back to where they came from: a deep cavren where their lord resided. They had succeded in one task, but failed in three others. Their lord, a huge, magnifacent black dragon, slapped his tail impatiently, daring anyone to come up with a n excuse why they had failed. Seeing that no one dared, he finally spoke.
"Why, have you failed me?" Daltar rumbled, waiting for an answer, " well?"
"They have gotten stronger Lord Daltar!" One of the excalimned, "How are we suppose to take down an entire group that killed Lord Cthlulhu!?"
"Wrong answer." Daltar snarled as he set the bold one into flames, "Anyone others?"
No one dared speaking.
"Your all lucky I don't set all you gnats up into flames!" He roared, "I will now brook no excuses from any of you! Understood?l
"Yes Lord Daltar!" They said in unision.
1111211111111111111.title: Avelwind's vital information

11112111111111111111.content: "AHHHH!!!" Leo yelled out clashing his claymore with Sen-Lee's blade. "About time I killed you!" Sen-Lee said pushing back. Letting the blades slip, Leo jumped back. "Where is that baster Leon? Not with you good" Sen-Lee said smriking. "Go to hell, you have something to do with all of this" Leo growled out. Sen-Lee ran and sliced low. Leo jumped over the swing, and kicked Sen-Lee in the face. Sen-Lee grabed his chin and truned around. Leo grabed Sen-Lee's soulder and drove his claymore tru his heart. "Now I need to know where she is and why you took her" Leon said. Then he drove his fans into Sen-Lee's neck. "Fuck you" Sen-Lee yelled swing his blade. Leo grab the arm that had the blade and broke the bone. Sen-Lee cried out in pain, Leo pulled away from Sen-Leee's neck. Then Leo kicked Sen-Lee and he slide off his claymore. Leo looked over Sen-Lee, what he learned made him mad. Leon then walked tru a portal. "What did you find?" Leo asked. "Nothing, he left once you attacked this place smart baster, you?" Leon said. Leo looked down,"I rather wait till we get back, Kronous and Hikari sould know frist". Leon looked at his son, then to Sen-Lee."Damn how did you kill him like that?". Leo sighed and put his claymore up, "Becuse he truned his back". Leon rised a brow, but he shook it off and walked behind Leo. What ever he had learn, it must be the worst.
11112111111111111111.title: Is there any other information?

111121111111111111111.content:
Leo and his father finally returned to camp.
Kronous, Hikari, Darion, Avelwind, and faopaw were all chatting around the large fire.
Hikari could instantly see the distress on Leos face.

She stood as they entered the campsite.
"What happened?"
"Sen-Lee attacked us...and he failed?"
"Did you find out anything?"
Leo sat down..staring into the flames.

"Unfortunately..yes.
When i bit into his neck..i got a brief glimpse into his memories.
It showed her being transferred to another unit.
I saw a large..evil looking giant creature.
It carried a long pitch black scythe."

Avelwind sighed heavilly.
"That would be Koas..Champion of Chaos.
That your daughter is in his custody does not bode well for her..or you."

Kronous stood beside Hikari.
"What will they do to her?"
" If we're lucky..nothing.
But we must move quickly and find out their location."

Faopaw stood and called to his brethren.
"Leave it to us..
We'll find them...no matter how long it takes.
We'll return when we have something."

Faopaw and the other two werewolves disappeared into the night.
Kronous stared off after them.
"Please hurry my friend...please hurry."
111121111111111111111.title: Horribly good...or wonderfully bad?

1111211111111111111111.content:
When they was gone from sight, Leo sighed and got up. He untied the claymore off of his back. And set it down next to the closes tree. He went around on the other side of the tree and sat ageant it. "Of corse she was taken when I tried to keep her from them" Leo sighed and put his hands on his head. He then heard a nose far away from the came. Then he felt the shadows, it was getting stronger and stonger be the second. "You fell that?" Sen-Gie said. "Yes I do it's the shadows and they are comeing fast" Leon growled. Leo reached around the tree, but his arm was pined by a blade. He looked over and saw a grinning shadow. The shadow grabed Leo by the neck and tossed him away from the tree. Then Leo heard gun shots, and blades clashing togater. Damn the shadows came back, and fast too. They berly felt them by the time they got there. Leo looked at the shadow, it darted into the darkness. He hear two sets of feet on his left and his right. Pulling out his 9mm, he started fireing to his left. But by the time he got over to his right he felt a blade rip tru his body. He hear the shadow say "Killing Sen-Lee was a bad idea, Kosa wants you dead, but by his scythe". Leo growled "You can go to hell", the shadow pulled out his blade from Leo. And smaked it ageanst his face. Every thing went black.
----
Faopaw sent the othe two werewolves out to differnt places. A trail has to be some where. But then he smelled blood, comeing from the camp. Then he felt the shadows, he saw some run tru a river towards camp. Damnt they attack at the worst of times. He truned around and headed back, he felt so many shadows around now. Where in the hell did they come from? The must have moved fast, realy fast to just apear out of no-where. He hoped that it wasn't too late.
1111211111111111111111.title: Was killing Sen-Lee a bad thing?

11112111111111111111111.content:
Faopaw had returned to camp.
Everyone was gathered in the middle of the camp..fending off attacks from the shadows...
He could see everyone...

Hikari and Kronous
Kaneda....
Sen-Gie and Avelwind...
Leon and Nikki...
Darion and Sev...

But where was Leo?

Faopaw reared his head and howled as loud as he could.
The forest rustled with activity.
Kronous heard the howl and knew what was coming.

"Get ready to move..."
Out of the darkened trees came the pack.
Hundred of werewolves entered the camp and attacked the shadows.
Faopaw ran to the group.

" I found their trail..
They are heading towards the poison marshes.
I think they have Leo with them."

Leon was enraged...
First Kronous' daughter..now his son!?
"Go after them...I will help delay them..."

The group nodded and headed away.
They shadows tried to pursue, but were cut off by the wolves.
"You must finish us before you get them." Faopaw growled.
He howled and the fight ensued.
11112111111111111111111.title: Chasing the enemy

111121111111111111111111.content:
Kronous ran ahead of the group, making sure that no trap was in front of the group. Darion had caught up to him and had stopped waiting for the others.
"Once we have time," Darion said to Kronous, who was still checking for traps," I need to give you a new blade. A blade, that I forged from very rare materials."
"Agreed." Kronous said, eyeing his blade, which looked like it was going to break off if it was to hit a hard surface with force,"It pains me to see this blade in such a state."
Darion, who nodded his head, said nothing. Kronous thanked Faopaw silently for his intervention, which could not've been planned more perfectly. But, Kronous knew that sooner or later, he'll need some help pushing back the shadows, which varied in forms. However, something disturbed him creatly. The fact that Avelwind still had information on the three insane ones had not cormforted Kronous a bit. Kronous knew what he had to do: to seek out Anderson's spirit, whom gave him advice in the form of a riddle. Even in death, the old man still had some humor in him, and that simply made the slayer grin.
"Darion, lead the others toward the marshes. I must make a stop at the cemetary."
"Alright. Just don't get lost. I don't feel like retrieving. You." Darion grinned," tell the old man I said hello."
"Will do. I trust you with them. Do not lead them into danger." Kronous said.
"No promises."
Kronous ran off to the west, leaving Darion to lead the group. Don't screw this up, Darion thought, good luck.
111121111111111111111111.title: The Hunt

1111211111111111111111111.content: Leon was running off, he heard the sounds of blades clashing. He had to check it out. Leon ran over a hill and seen Fox and shadows was around her. "DAMNIT" yelled Leon in his head. He had no blade, and he didn't want to use Soul Edge. On top on that he only have 24 bullets for both of his guns. Leon growled "Fuck it I will only use one". He ran down hill, he fired on the way down. Takeing out 4 of the 10 shadows. Fox had jumped over some and slice one in half. Leon reloaded and took down only 2 that round. "What in the hell you are doing here?" yelled Leon kicking one of the shadows away. "I sould be asking you the same thing" Fox said back driveing her blade into one of the shadows. There was only two shadows left, Leon clicked his gun and pointed it at the shadows. "Think fast!" one of the shadows yelled jumping in the tree. Then the shadow truned around and sent a dagger flying. It hit Fox dead in the chest, Leon fied killing the one hat jumped in the tree. He bashed the other shadow's blade away with his gun. Leon fired and hit the shadow's head. Leon looked ovet to Fox, ran over to her. He seen the dagger it was deep, and went stright tru her chest bone. Leon removed the mask that she wore, and seen that she was allready has blood dripping from her mouth. "Wh...what was that?" Fox studder, Leon sighed and said "A dagger". Fox knew when he said that the dagger hit a kill spot. "Gess we will.....never to get to....kill each other". Leon grined at that, "Oh one way or another we well kick each other other ass". Fox grab the dagger and pulled it out, she then yelled "FUCK". Leon was takken back that she did that. It would take a lot of force to get that dagger out. "Why the hell you just did that?" Leon asked. "Fuckn'...hurt being stuck in me" Fox replied. Leon could fell that she was slowly loosing her life. Leon couldn' help but ask "Do you realy want to die?"
1111211111111111111111111.title: Someone's P.O.V

11112111111111111111111111.content:
Darion rushed back to the group.
He entered the battlefield and quickly ran to leon and fox.
"What happened?"
"They swarmed out of nowhere.
We all got seperated...i have no idea where hikari, kaneda, or anyone else is."

Darion stood.
"ok. Gwt her out of here.
I'll catch up once i get everyone else."
Leon stood and faced him.

"Don't be stupid.
You can't take them all.
Let me help."
Darion turned fiercely and shook leon.

"She is injured and can't defend herself.
Kronous is off to the cemetary to talk with the old man.
Take her to the marshes and protect her until we arrive."

Darion ran off to fight and find the others.
"Damn..looks like i got no choice."
Leon scoops fox in his arms and begins running towards the marshes.
"You guys better get there soon...."
11112111111111111111111111.title: intervention

111121111111111111111111111.content:
Darion slashed his way through the hordes of enemies.
He needed to find the others...Kronous was counting no him!

He found the first group almost instantly.
Hikari and Avelwind were surrounded by almost 2 dozen shadows...and more surrounded them by the second.
"Hikari...hold on!"
The elven thief heard Darions voice, but could not tell where it came from.

"Lord Avelwind, help is coming.
Stay strong."
He nodded and faced the enemy.
"These evil creatures are not the worst i have faced.
They will not be the end of me!"

The shadows screeched in anger and bloodlust.
All at once, they rushed the elf and the druid mage.
Darion saw this and cursed himself.

He only hoped he was not too late to assist them.
111121111111111111111111111.title: finding the first of many

1111211111111111111111111111.content:
Darion inhaled greatly, and jumped into the fray cutting enemies down one by one. Of course, he had given up using on that cursed axe, for it was starting to feel like a lump of metal than the great weapon he used. But, when he finally relinqushed the axe, he obtained two runeblades, which he called Rage and Desire. It was suiting, considering his nature. Darion thought about it on long, boring days, but now, he is able to cut down an enemy faster than he was able to with a axe.
"Where are you guys?" Darion shouted, quickly scanning his surrondings,"Just keep fighting! I'm sure we'll meet up!"
Darion again lept into the fray taking out two more shadowbeings with him. He heard a visicous howl close by, and knew that Faopaw and his furry freak brothers were nearby. The other two he was looking for would be the most difficult, for they're only human. Sev was a good fighter, able to heal himself, as well as others, while Kaneda, that's what worried Darion the most. Kaneda was just human, but skilled assassian, able to use diffirent items at her disposal. Darion shool his head, and began to carve his way towards Hikari and the druid. Kronous trusted the former death knight, and Darion would not fail him. Could not fail him.
Darion inhaled again, and charged in again.

--------

Kronous had made his way to the graveyard, where he, Sev, Darion and Faopaw carried Anderson's casket to the grave. And now Kronous came now seeking advise from the dead old man. The reason he entrusted Darion with protecting the group was that he knew Darion could get the job done, and that Darion is like a brother to him. Pushing those thoughts out of his mind, Kronous slowed his pace. Anderson was killed defebding me, Kronous thought as he approached an altar, there is no way for me to repay him, since he's dead. Kronous kneeled down, muttering a prayer, and then stepped back, a blue ghost materilizing, no definite shape yet.
"I know why ye've come here." The ghost said, features now becoming more distinctive," and I truly wish I could help you."
"Give it to me straight, Anderson," Kronous said, sighing," are we able to stop this?"
"Each day, they get more powerful and closer to their goal," Anderson replied, stepping close to the slayer," but they are not cooperative. They fight each other everyday."
"Really? This could help us greatly then--"
"But, the dragon has the most influence. His madness drives his power."
"Great. So, if we got rid of him, we could possibly- Kronous was interuppted.
"You'd need a blade that has his very essence in order to defeat him. But, in order to get his essence, you need a scale of his." Anderson explained,"perhaps the blade Darion has planned for you will be a viable condiut. But, I must go, one of them lurks near here."
"Wait, Anderson!" Kronous said, reaching out to the incorapeal form," will we be able to defeat them?"
"Time will tell, and let your heart decide, lad." With that, Anderson disappeared.
Kronous stood there, taking in what Anderson had said. The old man may be right, Kronous wondered, but when was the old man ever wrong?
"Your time has come to en end, slayer. Prepare to join the ranks of the undead."
Kronous whirled around, seeing a dark-robed figrue, surronded by undead.
"Come get some, necromancer!" Kronous roared.
"Allow me to introduce myself, I am Alec the Reanimator, and I have come to claim your soul for our greet lord!"
1111211111111111111111111111.title: Fight or Die

11112111111111111111111111111.content:
Darion wasn't getting tired, just bored.
Fighting these...things had grown quite cumbersome. You knocked them down, 5 more takes its place, and that was fun at first with Darion, but now, it was getting annoying. He realized this was their plan to wear them down, to kill each of them slowly, one by one.
Not a bad way to go, Darion thought.
But isn't the way to go for their group. Both Kronous and Darion want to die in battle, Faopaw wants to leave a legacy OF battle for his...people, and Leon, Darion didn't know about him, he never really liked the guy. But, Darion thought, I don't like a lot of people. And he knew damn well the Hikari, Nikki, and Kaneda did not one of them dying(unless it was Darion, most likely), and the kids. Darion had thought long and hard recently when he saw the half-elf and the vampire kid. Leo had a temper that matched that of both Leon and Kronous, and Serena, Darion still didn't know what to make of her. A backstabbing rouge would be a good, genral term, but to crude. Assassain was more appopriate for her sitation. Stirring out of his thoughts, Darion noticed he was standing admist a pile of shadow bodies.
"Must've pulled back," Darion said, wiping sweat off his brow,"Been awhile since I fought like that."
"I'd say," Faopaw grinned," you fought more controlled....and yet wild."
"Must be my personality."
"Sorry to interuppt the heckling of each other, but we gotta find Kronous." Kaneda said urgently," Who knows what stupid things he can get into."
"20 bucks says he pissed off the old man," Sev chimned in, lifting his mace," Any takers?"
"I'll take that bet." Darion said, shaking hands with the templar.
"Alright, enough betting." Avelwind said, looking at the group," No doubt Kronous ran into Alec. I sense a feeling of dread and blight a mile or two from here."
"Let's go then." Darion said, grinning," I want to earn my 20 bucks."
11112111111111111111111111111.title: Back with Darion

111121111111111111111111111111.content:
"What you know, slayer," Alec said, planting his staff in the ground," Will get you killed. The forces of fear are readied, and will lash out at your feeble race."
"And whay YOU know, necromancer," Kronous responded, unsheathing his sword," is that I never back down from a fight, no matter how badly I'm outnumbered."
"You seem to be confusing bravery with stupidty. You cannot NOT, and will NOT, interfer with our plans. Your quest is going to end prematurely."
With that, Alec raised his hands up chanting. A few moments later, a huge skeleton climbed out of the ground, brandishing a rusty broadsword. Kronous took his own weapon, and charged the undead, and by the command of it's controller, it ran to meet him. It swung the blade with skill, but lazily it seemed to Kronous, and that what gave him an advantage over the undead giant.
"Your big," Kronous remarked to the giant," but I've fought bigger."
The skeleton responded by uttering a roar that sounded very dark. Closing the distance between them, the giant swung his blade. It made contact with Kronous's arm, causing the slayer to stagger back in pain. Roaring again, it contiuned toash out at the slayer with more power, accuracy, and speed. Everytime, Kronous would barely get his sword up in time just to deflect. Then the unthinkable happened.
Right before his very eyes, his sword snapped in two.
With nothing to defend or attack with, he attempted to move forward to attack Alec. But the giant intercepted the slayer, knocking him to the ground. Knowing his time had finally come, he clsed his eyes, awaiting the executing blow. It did not come though.
"For the Light!"
Opening his eyes, Kronous saw Sev leap towards the skeleton, then caving the skull in with a solid blow from his hammer. Alec merely released the ruined skeleton from his control, and grabbed his staff. The necromancer's eyes narrowed.
"Oh joy, the riff raff." Alec said, shaking his head," I would love to kill you all, but I have other matters to attend. Leave well enough alone, and you will not get killed...maybe."
With a slight hissing sound, the necromancer disappeared into thin air. Sev helped Kronous up.
"That was cutting it close," Sev said," to close. Sorry for not making it in better time."
"I'm alive, that's all that matters." Kronous said, picking up the destroyed sword," and this blade served me well.
"Time for an upgrade," Darion grinned," and I have the perfect blade for you. My father used it while he was alive, so I reforged it. I'll give it to you soon."
While he was talking, Darion pulled a twenty out of his pocket and handed it to Sev.
"You can't die yet, Kronous." Avelwind said stepping forward," you still have your fate to fulfill."
Kronous looked up at the cloudless sky, and he knew he was no where close to fulfilling whatever fate he was taking.
111121111111111111111111111111.title: Near execution

1111211111111111111111111111111.content:
Some where.......

Leo punched the wall over and over agene. “Why the fuck did this happen?” Leo yelled over and over agene in his head. Then he felt a similar pain run thru his body, then his head started to throb. He needed blood, and he felt the vampire pull getting stronger. Leo knew that sooner or later, if he didn’t get any blood. There is a chance that he could turn full vampire. Just then a guard inter the room, Leo turned around to face him. “Come on boss want to see you” said the guard grinning. Pulling out a some rope the guard started to walk towards Leo.

When the guard was close Leo charged the guard. But he kneed Leo in the gut and punched him in the face. Leo fell to the ground, and the guard kicked Leo in the side. “See what happens when you act up” the guard grinned kicking him again. Leo felt the pain again, but this time it was fowled by a burst of rage. Leo grab the guard’s leg and threw him into the wall. Getting up, he heard the guard’s heart start to beat fast. Leo looked at the guard and rage built back up in him. Then his human eye turned to that of a vampires. Glowing at him Leo ran over to him and bit onto his neck. Drinking the guard blood quickly Leo got up and looked at the open door.

“Time to get out of here” Leo said. Running out of the room and into the hallways Leo wonder where they taken him too. He turned a corner and saw a human in a scientist coat. With out thinking Leo took him to the ground and bite in to his neck. “The vamp kid is out” Leo heard a guard yell. Then ten grads busted thru some door at the end of the hall.

“Fuck him up” said a guard and bullets started flying. Leo ran at the guards, the bullets that was hitting Leo couldn’t fell. Because of the state of blood rage he was in. Breaking necks, and ripping out others. After Leo was done with them he busted thru the doors at the end of the hall. Leo saw a dark figer in front of him. “Good now be my pet” reaching out his hand. Leo felt his head throb and whispering in his head.

The dark figer closed his hand, Leo yelled out in pain as the throbbing got more and more intense. Falling to his knees and grabbing his head. The whispering now was yelling. “Be my pet and you shall feed as you wish” the figer said clutching his hand tighter. Leo felt his mind give way and he felt the figer grab onto it. “Good” he said grinning. Leo was breathing heavily and he look up at the dark figer who said ”Go attack Leon and the others”. Leo got up and walk away,he was joing by shadows. He tried to stop be he had no control over his body.

At camp

Leon was looking in the fire when Nikki walked up and said “Leon I am worried too”. Leon sighed and said “Something is going to happen, they want him for something……and Serena for that matter”. Nikki could see that Leon was in a dark state. “Leon is there something I should know?” Nikki asked. Leon look at her on said “no” then he look back into the fire. “Damnit Leon quit hiding what ever it is because me, Kronous, and Sen-Gie already know your hiding something” Nikki yelled. Leon turned his head and said “It’s nothing”
1111211111111111111111111111111.title: Back at the camp...
